CustomField.description: Calcul the end date of the renewal contract (panda docs)
CustomField.formula: DATE( YEAR(End_Date__c) + FLOOR((MONTH(End_Date__c) + Renewal_Period_Months__c - 1) / 12), MOD(MONTH(End_Date__c) + Renewal_Period_Months__c - 1, 12) + 1, DAY(End_Date__c) )
CustomField.label: Renewal end date
